bibl.title: Three Notes.
bibl.note: See p. 156: 2. The Amulet PKellis G. I 87 Again. Supplement to: IDEM, Intrusions into the Text of the Amulet P. Kellis G. I 87?, ZPE 137 (2001) p. 34. P. Kellis Gr. I, 87; - 3. Hesychius παγαίη· κύων. Compares verse 37 of Heitsch, Dichterfragmente 187-91, LIX 9 (P.G.M. IV, 2243-2347).
